article: How to Recognize That You Have a Crush on Someone
intro: Butterflies in your stomach, giddy laughter, jolts of electricity—does it all mean you’re crushing on someone, or are you just really into them as a friend? If you’re feeling pretty confused, don’t worry. We’re here to help you make sense of your feelings and figure out whether the person on your mind is just a friend, or if something else might be going on.

points.name: Examples and Letter to Tell a Person You Have a Crush on Them
